# This file is autogenerated
title: SignTransactionNotSupportedError
description: Overview of the SignTransactionNotSupportedError method
---

Throws an error indicating that signing a transaction is not supported by smart contracts.

<Note>
  `SignTransactionNotSupportedError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for
  BaseError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { SignTransactionNotSupportedError } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```
